Very well."},{"lineNumber":68425,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さあ、さっさと門を開け……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, open the gate quickly...\""},{"lineNumber":68426,"originalJapaneseLine":"鼻を鳴らし、魔物将軍は傲然と歩き出し……","translatedEnglishLine":"Snorting, the demon general arrogantly began to walk forward..."},{"lineNumber":68427,"originalJapaneseLine":"「撃って」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shoot!\""},{"lineNumber":68428,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおおおおッ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uoooooh!?\""},{"lineNumber":68429,"originalJapaneseLine":"篠田の脇から数名の火縄銃を持った兵士が起ち上がり","translatedEnglishLine":"Several soldiers armed with matchlock guns rose up beside Shinoda,"},{"lineNumber":68430,"originalJapaneseLine":"不意打ちで魔物将軍を狙撃した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and ambushed the demon general with a gunshot."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「先行偵察をしてきた部隊からなのですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's from the unit that did the advance reconnaissance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その、出城が行く手を塞いでいると」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say, um, there's a castle blocking our way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「出城？　こんな所にか……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A castle? In a place like this...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、そろそろ見えてきますが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, it should be coming into view soon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおぉっ……！？」
狭くごつごつした山道を塞ぐように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A narrow and rugged mountain path was blocked,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大な城門が魔軍を迎えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: by a huge castle gate that welcomed the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、馬鹿な……いつの間に、こんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn it... when did this happen...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 門の奥を窺い知る事は出来ないものの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though they couldn't peer inside beyond the gate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 規模から察すれば、数万程度の兵士は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: judging from its scale, it seemed capable of accommodating tens of thousands of soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 充分収容出来そうだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It appeared to be large enough to hold them sufficiently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これは、いったい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What on earth is this...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分からん、が…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't know, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やあ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不意に、頭上から声が掛かってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, a voice came from above their heads.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんだ、貴様は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Who are you...!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城門の上にいたのは、冴えない人間の雄だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one on top of the gate was an unimpressive human male.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「僕は篠田源五郎。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm Gengorou Shinoda.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合軍の、まあ警備担当かな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Part of the Free Cities Alliance Army, well, sort of in charge of security."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ならば門を開けろ！　死にたくなければな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then open the gates! If you don't want to die!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、いいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sure, that's fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なに？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-What?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「降伏してもいいよ。でも、条件をつけたいなあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We can surrender, but I'd like to set some conditions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僕だって危ない橋を渡るわけだし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After all, I'm not about to cross a dangerous bridge blindly."
(Are they serious...?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍は敵将の様子を窺ったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster general watched the enemy commander closely,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 距離のせいか、茫洋とした表情からは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but perhaps due to the distance, they couldn't read anything from his vague expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何も読み取れなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nothing could be deciphered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうするの？　力尽くで来て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What will you do? Force your way in and,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本気の防衛戦、させてみる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: make us fight a serious defensive battle?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……それを躊躇うと思ったのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Did you think I'd hesitate at that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この数だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With these numbers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「固いよ、ここの門は。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This gate is tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間掛かっちゃうけど、いいのかなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It'll take some time though, are you sure?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は、二重に時間に縛られている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army was constrained by time on two fronts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市軍が反転してMランドに来るまでに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had to conquer the headquarters before the Free Cities Army could reverse course and reach M Land,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 司令部を陥落させなければならないし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and they had to take down the command center,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食料抜きで兵を無理に動かすにも限界は来る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was also a limit to how far they could force their troops to move without supplies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかも、道は狭い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moreover, the path was narrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 十万の兵を擁していても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though they had an army of 100,000,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦えるのはその一割にも満たない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: fewer than one-tenth could actually fight at a time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「チッ、条件とやら、何だ。言ってみろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, what are these conditions? Speak up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局、そう言うしかなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, he had no choice but to say that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええっとねー、僕たちの、命と……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, um, our lives and..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後も指を折りながらゴニョゴニョと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, while counting on his fingers, he mumbled repeatedly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 篠田は繰り返す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shinoda repeated himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ええい聞こえん！　もっと大きな声を出せ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hey, I can't hear you! Speak louder!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちの城の中でやらない？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why don't we continue this inside the castle?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きな声で話すの疲れちゃうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm getting tired of speaking so loudly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……城の内部が確認できるなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...If we can confirm the inside of the castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけでも意義はあるか……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that alone might be worthwhile...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やむをえん。いいだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It can't be helped. Very well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあ、さっさと門を開け……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, open the gate quickly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鼻を鳴らし、魔物将軍は傲然と歩き出し……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Snorting, the demon general arrogantly began to walk forward...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「撃って」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shoot!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおッ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uoooooh!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 篠田の脇から数名の火縄銃を持った兵士が起ち上がり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several soldiers armed with matchlock guns rose up beside Shinoda,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不意打ちで魔物将軍を狙撃した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and ambushed the demon general with a gunshot.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「先行偵察をしてきた部隊からなのですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's from the unit that did the advance reconnaissance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その、出城が行く手を塞いでいると」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say, um, there's a castle blocking our way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「出城？　こんな所にか……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A castle? In a place like this...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、そろそろ見えてきますが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, it should be coming into view soon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおぉっ……！？」
狭くごつごつした山道を塞ぐように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A narrow and rugged mountain path was blocked,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大な城門が魔軍を迎えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: by a huge castle gate that welcomed the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、馬鹿な……いつの間に、こんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn it... when did this happen...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 門の奥を窺い知る事は出来ないものの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though they couldn't peer inside beyond the gate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 規模から察すれば、数万程度の兵士は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: judging from its scale, it seemed capable of accommodating tens of thousands of soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 充分収容出来そうだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It appeared to be large enough to hold them sufficiently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これは、いったい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What on earth is this...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分からん、が…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't know, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やあ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不意に、頭上から声が掛かってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, a voice came from above their heads.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんだ、貴様は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Who are you...!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城門の上にいたのは、冴えない人間の雄だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one on top of the gate was an unimpressive human male.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「僕は篠田源五郎。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm Gengorou Shinoda.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合軍の、まあ警備担当かな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Part of the Free Cities Alliance Army, well, sort of in charge of security."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ならば門を開けろ！　死にたくなければな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then open the gates! If you don't want to die!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、いいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sure, that's fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なに？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-What?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「降伏してもいいよ。でも、条件をつけたいなあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We can surrender, but I'd like to set some conditions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僕だって危ない橋を渡るわけだし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After all, I'm not about to cross a dangerous bridge blindly."
(Are they serious...?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍は敵将の様子を窺ったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster general watched the enemy commander closely,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 距離のせいか、茫洋とした表情からは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but perhaps due to the distance, they couldn't read anything from his vague expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何も読み取れなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nothing could be deciphered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうするの？　力尽くで来て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What will you do? Force your way in and,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本気の防衛戦、させてみる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: make us fight a serious defensive battle?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……それを躊躇うと思ったのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Did you think I'd hesitate at that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この数だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With these numbers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「固いよ、ここの門は。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This gate is tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間掛かっちゃうけど、いいのかなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It'll take some time though, are you sure?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は、二重に時間に縛られている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army was constrained by time on two fronts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市軍が反転してMランドに来るまでに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had to conquer the headquarters before the Free Cities Army could reverse course and reach M Land,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 司令部を陥落させなければならないし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and they had to take down the command center,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食料抜きで兵を無理に動かすにも限界は来る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was also a limit to how far they could force their troops to move without supplies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかも、道は狭い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moreover, the path was narrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 十万の兵を擁していても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though they had an army of 100,000,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦えるのはその一割にも満たない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: fewer than one-tenth could actually fight at a time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「チッ、条件とやら、何だ。言ってみろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, what are these conditions? Speak up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局、そう言うしかなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, he had no choice but to say that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええっとねー、僕たちの、命と……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, um, our lives and..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後も指を折りながらゴニョゴニョと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, while counting on his fingers, he mumbled repeatedly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 篠田は繰り返す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shinoda repeated himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ええい聞こえん！　もっと大きな声を出せ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hey, I can't hear you! Speak louder!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちの城の中でやらない？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why don't we continue this inside the castle?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きな声で話すの疲れちゃうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm getting tired of speaking so loudly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……城の内部が確認できるなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...If we can confirm the inside of the castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけでも意義はあるか……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that alone might be worthwhile...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やむをえん。いいだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It can't be helped. Very well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあ、さっさと門を開け……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, open the gate quickly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鼻を鳴らし、魔物将軍は傲然と歩き出し……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Snorting, the demon general arrogantly began to walk forward...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「撃って」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shoot!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおッ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uoooooh!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 篠田の脇から数名の火縄銃を持った兵士が起ち上がり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several soldiers armed with matchlock guns rose up beside Shinoda,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不意打ちで魔物将軍を狙撃した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and ambushed the demon general with a gunshot.
